menuitem.name: LA - Labor Practices and Decent Work
LA1 - Total workforce by employment type, employment contract, and region
LA2 - Total number and rate of employee turnover by age group, gender, and region
LA3 - Benefits provided to full-time employees that are not provided to temporary or part-time employees, by major operations
LA4 - Percentage of employees covered by collective bargaining agreements
LA5 - Minimum notice period(s) regarding significant operational changes, including whether it is specified in collective agreements
LA6 - Percentage of total workforce represented in formal joint management-worker health and safety committees that help monitor and advise on occupational health and safety programs
LA7 - Rates of injury, occupational diseases, lost days, and absenteeism, and total number of work-related fatalities by region
LA8 - Education, training, counseling, prevention, and risk-control programs in place to assist workforce members, their families, or community members regarding serious diseases
LA9 - Health and safety topics covered in formal agreements with trade unions.Health and safety topics covered in formal agreements with trade unions
LA10 - Average hours of training per year per employee by employee category
LA11 - Programs for skills management and lifelong learning that support the continued employability of employees and assist them in managing career endings
LA12 - Percentage of employees receiving regular performance and career development reviews
LA13 - Composition of governance bodies and breakdown of employees per category according to gender, age group, minority group membership, and other indicators of diversity
LA14 - Ratio of basic salary of men to women by employee category

record.field: <form string="typo_contracts"> <label name="code"/> <field name="code"/> <label name="name"/> <field name="name"/> <label name="lib_long"/> <field name="lib_long" colspan="4"/> </form>
<form string="typo_collective"> <label name="code"/> <field name="code"/> <label name="name"/> <field name="name"/> <label name="lib_long"/> <field name="lib_long" colspan="4"/> </form>
<tree string="typo_employee"> <field name="code" /> <field name="name" /> <field name="lib_long" /> <field name="parent" tree_invisible="1"/> <field name="childs" tree_invisible="1"/> </tree>

<form string="typo_employee"> <label name="code"/> <field name="code"/> <label name="name"/> <field name="name"/> <label name="active"/> <field name="active"/> <label name="parent"/> <field name="parent"/> <label name="lib_long"/> <field name="lib_long" colspan="4"/> </form>
<tree string="typo_program"> <field name="code" /> <field name="name" /> <field name="lib_long" /> <field name="parent" tree_invisible="1"/> <field name="childs" tree_invisible="1"/> </tree>

<form string="typo_program"> <label name="code"/> <field name="code"/> <label name="name"/> <field name="name"/> <label name="active"/> <field name="active"/> <label name="parent"/> <field name="parent"/> <label name="lib_long"/> <field name="lib_long" colspan="4"/> </form>

<data> <xpath expr="/form/field[@name="company"]" position="after" > <notebook colspan="6"> <page string="General" id="general"> <group string="Main Info" id="main_info" colspan="2"> <label name="ssn"/> <field name="ssn" colspan="3"/> <label name="sex"/> <field name="sex" colspan="3"/> <label name="dob"/> <field name="dob" colspan="3"/> <label name="age"/> <field name="age" colspan="3"/> </group> <group string="Photo" id="man_picture" colspan="2"> <field name="photo" img_width="155" img_height="155" height="155" width="155" widget="image"/> </group> </page> <page string="Contract" id="contract"> <label name="contract"/> <field name="contract" widget="selection"/> <label name="typo"/> <field name="typo"/> <label name="dobc"/> <field name="dobc"/> <label name="dodc"/> <field name="dodc"/> <label name="collective"/> <field name="collective"/> <label name="pminot"/> <field name="pminot"/> <label name="boolminot"/> <field name="boolminot"/> </page> <page string="Absenteesim" id="absenteeism"> <field name="absenteeism" /> </page> </notebook> <newline/> </xpath> </data>

<data> <xpath expr="/form/notebook/page[@id="company"]" position="after"> <page string="Prestations" id="prestations"> <field name="prestations"/> </page> <page string="Committee" id="committee"> <field name="committee"/> </page> <page string="Program" id="program"> <field name="program"/> </page> </xpath> </data>

<tree string="Employment la1"> <field name="contract" widget="selection"/> <field name="typo" widget="selection"/> <field name="company" widget="selection"/> <field name="country" widget="selection"/> <field name="subdivision" widget="selection"/> <field name="occ" /> </tree>
<graph string="Employment la1 contract" type="pie"> <x> <field name="contract" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
<graph string="Employment la1 type" type="pie"> <x> <field name="typo" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
<graph string="Employment la1 country" type="pie"> <x> <field name="country" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
<graph string="Employment la1 subdivision" type="pie"> <x> <field name="subdivision" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>

<tree string="Employment la2"> <field name="sex" /> <field name="dodc" /> <field name="age" /> <field name="country" widget="selection"/> <field name="subdivision" widget="selection"/> <field name="occ" /> </tree>
<graph string="Employment la2 sex" type="pie"> <x> <field name="sex" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
<graph string="Employment la2 age" type="pie"> <x> <field name="age" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
<graph string="Employment la2 country" type="pie"> <x> <field name="country" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
<graph string="Employment la2 subdivision" type="pie"> <x> <field name="subdivision" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
<graph string="Benefits provided to full-time employees" type="pie"> <x> <field name="prestations" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
LA3 - Benefits provided to full-time employees

<tree string="Employment la4"> <field name="company" widget="selection"/> <field name="country" widget="selection"/> <field name="subdivision" widget="selection"/> <field name="collective" widget="selection"/> <field name="occ" /> </tree>
<graph string="Employment la4 collective" type="pie"> <x> <field name="collective" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
<graph string="Employment la4 country" type="pie"> <x> <field name="country" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
<graph string="Employment la4 subdivision" type="pie"> <x> <field name="subdivision" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
LA4 - Employees covered by collective bargaining agreements

<tree string="Employment la5"> <field name="company" widget="selection"/> <field name="country" widget="selection"/> <field name="subdivision" widget="selection"/> <field name="pminot" /> <field name="boolminot" widget="selection"/> </tree>
<graph string="Employment la5 Minimum" type="vbar"> <x> <field name="company" /> </x> <y> <field name="pminot"/> </y> </graph>
LA5 - Minimum notice period(s) regarding significant operational changes
<graph string="Total workforce represented in formal joint management-worker" type="vbar"> <x> <field name="company" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
<graph string="Percentage of total workforce represented in formal joint management-worker" type="pie"> <x> <field name="percentage" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
LA6 - Percentage of total workforce represented in formal joint management-worker health and safety committees

<tree string="la7"> <field name="company" widget="selection"/> <field name="country" widget="selection"/> <field name="subdivision" widget="selection"/> <field name="absenteeism" widget="selection"/> <field name="nbj" /> <field name="occ" /> </tree>

<graph string="Rates of injury, occupational diseases, lost days, and absenteeism, and total number of work-related fatalities by region" type="pie"> <x> <field name="company" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>

<graph string="Rates of injury, occupational diseases, lost days, and absenteeism, and total number of work-related fatalities by region" type="pie"> <x> <field name="country" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>

<graph string="Rates of injury, occupational diseases, lost days, and absenteeism, and total number of work-related fatalities by region" type="pie"> <x> <field name="subdivision" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>

<graph string="Rates of injury, occupational diseases, lost days, and absenteeism, and total number of work-related fatalities by region" type="pie"> <x> <field name="absenteeism" /> </x> <y> <field name="nbj"/> </y> </graph>

<graph string="Rates of injury, occupational diseases, lost days, and absenteeism, and total number of work-related fatalities by region" type="vbar"> <x> <field name="absenteeism" /> </x> <y> <field name="occ"/> </y> </graph>
LA7 - Rates of injury, occupational diseases, lost days, and absenteeism, and total number of work-related fatalities by region
<tree string="typo_committee"> <field name="code" /> <field name="name" /> <field name="lib_long" /> <field name="parent" tree_invisible="1"/> <field name="childs" tree_invisible="1"/> </tree>

<form string="typo_committee"> <label name="code"/> <field name="code"/> <label name="name"/> <field name="name"/> <label name="active"/> <field name="active"/> <label name="parent"/> <field name="parent"/> <label name="lib_long"/> <field name="lib_long" colspan="4"/> </form>
<tree string="typo_absenteeism"> <field name="code" /> <field name="name" /> <field name="lib_long" /> <field name="parent" tree_invisible="1"/> <field name="childs" tree_invisible="1"/> </tree>

<form string="typo_absenteeism"> <label name="code"/> <field name="code"/> <label name="name"/> <field name="name"/> <label name="active"/> <field name="active"/> <label name="parent"/> <field name="parent"/> <label name="lib_long"/> <field name="lib_long" colspan="4"/> </form>
<tree string="Évolution des absenteeisms"> <field name="dateb" /> <field name="datee" /> <field name="absenteeism" /> </tree>

<form string="Évolution des absenteeisms" col="2"> <notebook colspan="6"> <page string="General" id="general"> <label name="dateb"/> <field name="dateb"/> <label name="datee"/> <field name="datee"/> <label name="absenteeism"/> <field name="absenteeism" widget="selection"/> </page> </notebook> </form>
<form string="typo_prestations"> <label name="code"/> <field name="code"/> <label name="name"/> <field name="name"/> <label name="lib_long"/> <field name="lib_long" colspan="4"/> </form>

<form string="Prestations evolution" col="2"> <notebook colspan="6"> <page string="General" id="general"> <label name="dateb"/> <field name="dateb"/> <label name="datee"/> <field name="datee"/> <label name="prestations"/> <field name="prestations" widget="selection"/> </page> </notebook> </form>
